__e: I was with Sean tonight, and he said some things that just weren't right.

As long he has Sean, you don't stand a chance.
Look, if this guy has information on Sean, I want it.
- Sean told me that he helped you today.
I hear you're taking Sean Walker off our hands?
I gave you Sean Walker's baby less than a year ago.

You wouldn't have wanted your kids around me.
Sean, you're not that different from me, you know.
- Yeah. So, Sean, you wanted to see us, and we wanted to see you.
